main event: On November 7, 1957, a civilian reported a UFO sighting in the Texas/New Mexico area, observing an object changing color and descending.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a basketball and changing from silver to red., The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes., The object was observed rotating and descending at a southwest heading., Observers indicated that the object was not identifiable as a spacecraft, balloon, or aircraft., Venus was noted in the area, leading to speculation about the object's identification.
sighted object: one silver object changing to red
witness description: Civilians including border patrolmen and a correspondent
